TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEditableCollectionView

summary.span: 定义一些方法和属性， 实现它们以向集合提供编辑功能。

span.span: Defines methods and properties that a implements to provide editing capabilities to a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当集合视图实现接口时 ，如果允许对其进行更改，则可以通过使用公开的方法和属性来直接更改基础集合，而不 考虑集合的类型。When a collection view implements the interface, you can directly change the underlying collection, if it allows changes to be made, by using the methods and properties that exposes, regardless of the collection's type. 类型 、 和 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 从继承的类型 。The types , , and are the types that ship with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] that inherit from . 这些类型还实现 ，因此你可以编辑使用这些类型之一的集合。These types also implement the , so you can edit a collection that uses one of those types. 特别是，通常使用，因为 属性是 。, in particular, is often used because the property is an . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过使用定义的方法向集合中添加项 。The following example shows how to add an item to a collection by using methods that are defined by . 此应用程序显示待售项列表，并为用户提供添加、编辑或删除项的选项。This application displays a list of items for sale and gives the user the option of adding, editing, or removing an item. 当用户添加或编辑某项时，将提示用户输入一个新项。When the user adds or edits an item, a form prompts the user to enter a new item. 如果用户提交了窗体，则该项将提交给集合。If the user submits the form, the item is committed to the collection. 如果用户取消了窗体，则该项将被丢弃。If the user cancels the form, the item is discarded. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AddNew() cil managed

span.span: Adds a new item to the collection.
The new item that is added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用会 开始添加事务。Calling begins an add transaction. 应调用 或 以结束添加事务。You should call or to end the add transaction. 新项始终出现在 "集合" 视图中。A new item always appears in the collection view. 当调用时，应用于视图的任何筛选、排序或分组都将应用于新项 。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，它将提示用户添加一个新项。The following example creates a that prompts the user to add a new item. 然后，它调用 创建一个新的对象，并将的设置 为该对象。Then it calls to create a new object and sets the of the to that object. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanAddNew As Boolean
public: property bool CanAddNew { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以将新项添加到集合中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a new item can be added to the collection.

value.span: 如果可以将新项添加到集合中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a new item can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果满足以下条件，则可以添加新项：An can add a new item if the following are true: - 可以将项添加到基础集合。An item can be added to the underlying collection. 例如，如果集合是只读的， 则为 `false` 。For example, if the collection is read-only, is `false`. - 可以创建集合中的类型的对象。The can create an object of the type that is in the collection. 例如，如果集合的类型为 ，则 必须能够创建类型的对象 `T` 。For example, if the collection is of type , the must be able to create an object of type `T`. ## Examples 下面的示例检查是否可以将项添加到集合中。The following example checks whether an item can be added to the collection. 如果 为 `false` ，则该示例告知用户无法添加项。If is `false`, the example tells the user that an item cannot be added. 否则，它会显示提示用户添加新项的窗体。Otherwise, it shows a form that prompts the user to add a new item. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections) . [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanCancelEdit As Boolean
public: property bool CanCancelEdit { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示集合视图是否可以放弃挂起的更改并还原所编辑对象的原始值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.

value.span: 如果集合视图可以放弃挂起的更改并还原所编辑对象的原始值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果视图支持对当前编辑的项的 "挂起的更改" 的概念，则为。 is `true` if the view supports the notion of "pending changes" on the currently edited item. 例如， `true` 如果所编辑的项实现了 ，或者如果视图包含可用于回滚更改的项状态的信息，则集合视图可能会返回。For example, a collection view might return `true` if the edited item implements , or if the view has information about the item's state that it can use to roll back changes. `false`如果视图无法还原对象上的更改，则为。 is `false` if the view cannot revert changes on an object. 在这种情况下，调用 会导致视图退出编辑状态，并提供逻辑来还原所编辑对象的更改。In that case, call to cause the view to exit the edit state and provide logic to revert the changes on the object that was edited. ## Examples 下面的示例将 检查是否可以在调用之前还原已编辑项的原始值 。The following example gets to check whether the original values of the edited item can be restored before it calls . 如果无法还原这些值，则必须提供其他逻辑来实现此目的。If the values cannot be restored, you must supply additional logic to do so. 如果它们可以为，则在调用此示例时，将还原这些值 。If they can be, the values are restored when the example calls . 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CancelEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 结束编辑事务，并还原项的原始值（如有可能）。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and, if possible, restores the original value to the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将设置 为 `null` ，并使集合视图退出编辑状态。 sets to `null` and causes the collection view to exit the edit state. 如果 为 `true` ， 还将还原已编辑对象的原始值。If is `true`, also restores the original values of the edited object. ## Examples 下面的示例将 检查是否可以在调用之前还原已编辑项的原始值 。The following example gets to check whether the original values of the edited item can be restored before it calls . 如果无法还原这些值，则必须提供其他逻辑来实现此目的。If the values cannot be restored, you must supply additional logic to do so. 如果它们可以为，则在调用此示例时，将还原这些值 。If they can be, the values are restored when the example calls . 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

summary.span: 结束添加事务并放弃挂起的新项。

span.span: Ends the add transaction and discards the pending new item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例显示提示用户添加新项的窗体。The following example displays a form that prompts the user to add a new item. 如果用户提交窗体，则调用 以将该项添加到集合中。If the user submits the form, the example calls to add the item to the collection. 如果用户取消了窗体，则示例将调用 以放弃该项。If the user cancels the form, the example calls to discard the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). span.span: if an item can be removed from the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false`如果基础集合是只读的，则为。 is `false` if the underlying collection is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 以检查是否可以从集合中移除项。The following example calls to check whether an item can be removed from the collection. 如果可以删除某个项，则此示例将提示用户确认该操作，并 在用户单击 **"是"** 时调用。If an item can be removed, the example prompts the user to confirm the action and calls if the user clicks **Yes**. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). summary.span: 结束编辑事务并保存挂起的更改。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and saves the pending changes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个提示用户编辑现有项的窗体。The following example creates a form that prompts the user to edit an existing item. 如果用户提交窗体，则调用 以保存对集合所做的更改。If the user submits the form, the example calls to save the changes to the collection. 如果用户取消了窗体，则示例将调用 以放弃更改。If the user cancels the form, the example calls to discard the changes. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用时，应用于的任何筛选、排序或分组 都会应用于新的项 。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the is applied to the new item when is called. ## Examples 下面的示例显示提示用户添加新项的窗体。The following example displays a form that prompts the user to add a new item. 如果用户提交窗体，则调用 以将该项添加到集合中。If the user submits the form, the example calls to add the item to the collection. 如果用户取消了窗体，则示例将调用 以放弃该项。If the user cancels the form, the example calls to discard the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个提示用户编辑现有项的窗体。The following example creates a form that prompts the user to edit an existing item. 如果用户提交了窗体，则会将更改提交到集合。If the user submits the form, the changes are committed to the collection. 如果用户取消了窗体，则将放弃所做的更改。If the user cancels the form, the changes are discarded. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections) . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(object item) cil managed

span.span: The item to remove.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的项。

span.span: Removes the specified item from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不 `item` 在集合中，则 不执行任何操作。If `item` is not in the collection, does nothing. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 以检查是否可以从集合中移除项。The following example calls to check whether an item can be removed from the collection. 如果可以删除某个项，则此示例将提示用户确认该操作，并 在用户单击 **"是"** 时调用。If an item can be removed, the example prompts the user to confirm the action and calls if the user clicks **Yes**. 有关完整示例，请参阅[使用 IEditableCollectionView 更改集合示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

span.span: The position of the item to remove.

summary.span: 从集合中删除指定位置的项。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified position from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index`相对于集合视图，而不是集合。`index` is relative to the collection view, not the collection. 例如，如果集合包含10个项，并且视图具有， 因此显示7个项，则的有效值为 `index` 0 到6。For example, if the collection has 10 items and the view has a so that 7 items appear, the valid values of `index` are 0 through 6.

exception.span: 小于 0 或大于集合视图中的项数。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the number of items in the collection view.
